Sentences.Sentence: How happy is the one who says I am a Turk!
There is not honor in cowardice, there is honor in progress.
Anyone who does not react to an injustice is a mute demon.
If you don't know my worth when I'm with you; The day you know my worth, you won't find me next to you..
Show your love. To hide is to give opportunity to others.
Greetings to those who think that they are inaccessible when even the Allah to whom I am a victim can be reached five times a day.
